data.title: Change Registered Office Address in Gangakhed
meta_keywords: change registered office address in gangakhed
data.meta_description: filingbuzz is one easy platform for online change registered office address in gangakhed
data.text:
Each company required to have an its office of a company or an LLP where all official communication acknowledging and receiving and noticed as may be addressed to it called office address. The registered address of the company must always be an effective address for receiving necessary communications, noticed for avoid to delays it is important that all correspondence sent to this address is dealt with promptly. Business person always requires a registered the residential or any other business place as registered office during the company registration but on later then you want to change the registered office of a company so in this situation the registered office of a Company or LLP can be changed within the local limits of any city, town or village where such office is established by just giving a notice to the concerned Registrar within 30 days after the date of the change.

Under the section of 12 of the Companies Act 2013, When a company is incorporated it might to have its own registered office of within 15 days of its corporation for receiving and sending all the documents and notices which are sent to the company.

A registered office is most important for a company as it is a place where maintains all the annual returns, books of account, statutory Registers, annual general meetings are held. It also helps in determining the jurisdiction over the company under some acts.

Modes to change registered office :
